languages.text: "Ты — тот человек, что может остановить катастрофу. И потому мы очень, очень хотим тебе помочь. Номос — не человек, но мы научились видеть в людях больше, чем просто оболочки. Мы хотим их спасти и защитить".

"You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."
languages.original_text: "Ты — тот человек, что может остановить катастрофу. И потому мы очень, очень хотим тебе помочь. Номос — не человек, но мы научились видеть в людях больше, чем просто оболочки. Мы хотим их спасти и защитить".

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos is not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

"You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos is not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

"You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

"You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

"You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

languages.text: 「この災害を止められるのはあなたです。そして我々はあなたを助けたい。本当に。手伝わせてほしい。ノモスは人類ではないけれど、人がシェル以上の存在であると学んだ。彼らを救いたい。彼らを守りたい」
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: 「この災害を止められるのはあなたです。そして我々はあなたを助けたい。本当に。手伝わせてほしい。ノモスは人類ではないけれど、人がシェル以上の存在であると学んだ。彼らを救いたい。彼らを守りたい」

languages.text: “你是唯一能阻止这场灾难的人，我们想要帮你，真的。让我们来帮忙吧，虽然诺莫斯不是人类，但在我们眼中，人类并不仅仅是凡胎肉身的躯壳而已。我们想要拯救他们，保护他们。”
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: “你是唯一能阻止这场灾难的人，我们想要帮你，真的。让我们来帮忙吧，虽然诺莫斯不是人类，但在我们眼中，人类并不仅仅是凡胎肉身的躯壳而已。我们想要拯救他们，保护他们。”

languages.text: "Ihr könnt die Katastrophe verhindern. Und wir wollen Euch helfen. Das wollen wir. Lasst uns helfen. Nomos sind nicht menschlich, doch wir haben gelernt, Menschen als mehr anzusehen denn nur als Hüllen. Wir wollen sie retten. Sie beschützen."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt die Katastrophe verhindern. Und wir wollen Euch helfen. Das wollen wir. Lasst uns helfen. Nomos sind nicht menschlich, doch wir haben gelernt, Menschen als mehr anzusehen denn nur als Hüllen. Wir wollen sie retten. Sie beschützen."

languages.text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez empêcher cette catastrophe et nous souhaitons vous aider. Nous le voulons. Laissez-nous vous aider. Bien que nous ne soyons pas humains, nous avons appris à voir les gens au-delà de leur enveloppe corporelle et nous voulons les sauver, les protéger. »
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez empêcher cette catastrophe et nous souhaitons vous aider. Nous le voulons. Laissez-nous vous aider. Bien que nous ne soyons pas humains, nous avons appris à voir les gens au-delà de leur enveloppe corporelle et nous voulons les sauver, les protéger. »

languages.text: «Usted es {mf|el único|la única} que puede impedir el desastre. Y queremos ayudarle. De verdad. Deje que le ayudemos. Nomos no somos humanos, pero hemos aprendido a ver a las personas como algo más que simples cascarones. Deseamos salvarlas. Protegerlas».
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: «Usted es {mf|el único|la única} que puede impedir el desastre. Y queremos ayudarle. De verdad. Deje que le ayudemos. Nomos no somos humanos, pero hemos aprendido a ver a las personas como algo más que simples cascarones. Deseamos salvarlas. Protegerlas».

languages.text: "Bu felaketi önleyebilecek olan sizsiniz. Size yardım etmek istiyoruz. Gerçekten istiyoruz. Yardım etmemize izin verin. Nomos insan değil ancak insanları birer kabuktan çok daha fazlası olarak görmeyi öğrendik. Onları kurtarmak istiyoruz... Korumak istiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can prevent the disaster. And we want to help you. We do. Let us help. Nomos are not human, but we have learned to see people as more than shells. We want to save them. Protect them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu felaketi önleyebilecek olan sizsiniz ve size yardım etmek istiyoruz. Gerçekten istiyoruz. Yardım etmemize izin verin. Nomos insan değil ancak insanları, bir kabuktan çok daha fazlası olarak görmeyi öğrendik. Onları kurtarmak istiyoruz... Korumak istiyoruz."
